label: ham
subject:
[PATCH] Updated: Implement simple means of supporting pam_winbind
	UPN logins
body: Commodities now confront one another in a double capacity: actually as use-values, ideally as exchange values. The twofold aspect of labor contained in them is reflected in their mutual relations; the special concrete labor being virtually present as their use-value, while universal abstract labor-time is ideally represented in their price in which commodities appear as commensurable embodiments of the same value―substance differing merely in quantity.
